name: Asteroid Race
description:
Use arrow keys or WASD keys to move, move mouse to rotate, click to shoot.

Modifications: 

  • Asteroids spawners move with the camera
  • Large asteroids break into smaller asteroids of random numbers
  • Timer feature added
  • Teleportation & a Black Hole to keep the player from going too far
  • UI re-skinned

Credits

Created by WChung for Game Design & Development 1 on Coursera.com

Planet art in level 3 by Geyu Zhu
